F/S T212 1909 Obak  Howse, Sacramento
SGC 30.  Card is beautiful and would have easily graded a 50 if not for spider web wrikles to the right of his face.  It looks like someone must have bent that area by pressing a finger down on it.  You have to really look carefully to see the wrinkl
